overview: Former WBC heavyweight world champion and boxing superstar Deontay "The Bronze Bomber" Wilder makes his long-awaited return to the ring to battle top-rated Robert “The Nordic Nightmare” Helenius in an explosive 12-round battle between ferocious punchers in the main event of a FOX Sports PBC Pay-Per-View.
title: Deontay Wilder vs. Robert Helenius
